description: Navigate to 'Integrations' tab in WPForms settings to manage integrations like Constant Contact and Dropbox.
Click '+ Add New Account' button to integrate Zoho CRM with WPForms.
Enter email or mobile number and click 'Next' to sign in to Zoho.
Click 'Sign up now' to create a new Zoho account if you don't have one.
Click 'Accept' to allow WPForms to access data in your Zoho account.
Zoho CRM is successfully connected, indicated by the 'Connected' status.
Click 'Add New Connection' to set up a new Zoho CRM connection in WPForms.
Enter a nickname for the connection and click 'OK' to proceed.
Select an account from the 'Account' dropdown to configure Zoho CRM connection.
Choose 'Create/Update Contact' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown.
Fill in mandatory fields like Email, Name, and Contact Owner for Zoho CRM integration.
Click the tag icon to add a note in the Zoho CRM connection.
Map custom fields by selecting Zoho CRM fields and corresponding form fields.
Select 'Create/Update Lead' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown for Zoho CRM.
Fill in lead details like Email, Lead Name, and Company for Zoho CRM integration.
Click the tag icon to add a note in the Zoho CRM connection.
Map custom fields by selecting Zoho CRM fields and corresponding form fields.
Select 'Delete Contact' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown for Zoho CRM.
Select the email field to identify which contact to delete in Zoho CRM.
